DOC.brief_summary: This randomize trial educational intervention reduce risk diabetes among urban American Indian woman
DOC.detailed_description: Two hundred American Indian woman age 18 40 year recruit large Southwest city participate type 2 diabetes prevention intervention . Half woman randomize participated educational intervention half assign delay intervention . Measures obtain baseline , 6-months,12-months 18-months .
DOC.criteria: American Indian woman Aged 1840 year Living Albuquerque area Not diabetes Pregnancy Planning become pregnant within 2 year Diagnosed diabetes fast blood glucose > 126 plan move town next 2 year
